key.name: callsign
key.description: Your amateur radio callsign registered with EchoLink.

key.name: password
key.description: Your EchoLink account password.

key.name: name
key.description: Your name as it will appear to other operators.

key.name: location
key.description: A description of your location (city, state/province, country).

key.name: info
key.description: Additional information about your station.

key.name: directory-servers
key.description: Space-separated list of EchoLink directory servers.

key.name: list-refresh-time
key.description: How often to refresh the station list, in minutes.

key.name: start-as-busy
key.description: Start the application in busy mode.

key.name: bind-address
key.description: Local IP address to bind to. Leave empty for automatic.

key.name: proxy-enabled
key.description: Enable EchoLink proxy server connection.

key.name: proxy-server
key.description: Hostname or IP address of the EchoLink proxy server.

key.name: proxy-port
key.description: TCP port of the EchoLink proxy server.

key.name: proxy-password
key.description: Password for the EchoLink proxy server.

key.name: mic-audio-device
key.description: Audio device to use for microphone input.

key.name: spkr-audio-device
key.description: Audio device to use for speaker output.

key.name: use-full-duplex
key.description: Enable simultaneous transmit and receive.

key.name: connect-sound
key.description: Sound file to play when a connection is established.

key.name: card-sample-rate
key.description: Audio card sample rate in Hz.

key.name: chat-encoding
key.description: Character encoding for chat messages.

key.name: vox-enabled
key.description: Enable voice-operated transmission.

key.name: vox-threshold
key.description: VOX activation threshold in dB.

key.name: vox-delay
key.description: VOX hang time in milliseconds.

key.name: bookmarks
key.description: List of bookmarked station callsigns.

key.name: connect-to-ip
key.description: Last IP address or hostname connected to.

key.name: window-width
key.description: Main window width in pixels.

key.name: window-height
key.description: Main window height in pixels.

key.name: window-maximized
key.description: Whether the main window is maximized.
